name: Ouma's Love Hotel (Amami Version)
description:
A visual novel where it’s Ouma who got a Love Hotel key, so he intends to get the most out of it! Naturally, his approach is much more focused than Saihara’s and his acting skills are riiight for the job.

This is Amami Rantaro’s Love Hotel event, though much longer and with a lot of fun deviations thanks to Ouma’s ways to play it out!

♚ Reminder that the game is 18+, much like V3 and the canon Love Hotel, wiiiith something extra if you get the best ending.

♚ The play time is about 1 hr per full run, 2 hrs to try more options. A small VN!

♚ Also, the game is silent, so I strongly recommend V3’s “Cool Morning (Extended)” as you play.

Thanks for playing our first independent fangame release!!
